item.title: What Is EulaIQ and Why Everyone‚Äôs Talking About It
item.description:
Hey there, curious human üëã‚Äîit‚Äôs me, Euladipa, your friendly animation creature from the land of motion graphics.

¬†If your one-hour math video takes 84 hours to edit‚Äîand you‚Äôre juggling a mini production studio in your pocket, with one app for cutting, another for effects, and a third for captions‚Äîplus a sprinkle of mobile templates and external tools to keep the workflow humming, you‚Äôve come to the right place.

item.title: The Day I Realized Education Was Broken
item.description:
I‚Äôve always been the student who excelled. All through K‚Äì12, I was top of my class‚Äînot because I was naturally gifted, but because I simply outworked everyone.

I started preparing for university entrance exams years in advance. I devoured textbooks, practiced past questions, memorized entire chapters. For a long time, it worked.

But when I got into pharmacy school, everything changed. Suddenly, the volume of material multiplied. Lecturers moved at a brutal pace, dumping massive resources week after week, expecting us to absorb it all and somehow keep up.

item.title: Why We Made EulaIQ Free (Even Though It‚Äôs Hard to Scale)
item.description:
This is not a ‚Äúgrowth hack.‚Äù
It‚Äôs a decision born out of frustration, vision, and real love for the people we‚Äôre building for.

‚ÄúHow are you offering all this for free?‚Äù
‚ÄúIs it sustainable?‚Äù
‚ÄúAre you just buying users?‚Äù

We get those questions a lot.

So here‚Äôs the real story:
We made EulaIQ free ‚Äî not because it‚Äôs easy, but because it‚Äôs the only way to truly solve the problem.

item.title: Why I Dropped Out of Pharmacy School to Build EulaIQ
item.description:
People ask me why I dropped out of pharmacy school to build an AI study tool.

To some, it sounds reckless.
Honestly, it kind of was.
But sometimes you have to bet everything on the problem you can‚Äôt ignore.

Growing up, I was always around education.
My dad runs a K12 school, so most of my life has been filled with ideas around learning, teaching, and improving how we study.

item.title: Why We Built EulaIQ ‚Äî And What Comes Next
item.description:
Studying shouldn‚Äôt suck.

You shouldn‚Äôt dread opening a textbook.

EulaIQ turns your notes into something you actually want to come back to.

Right now, millions of students open a textbook and either binge-read or zone out.
They cram, skim, scroll, and repeat‚Äîwithout retention or feedback.
Education rewards this. Schools ignore it.
We won‚Äôt.

So we built a product.
And now, we‚Äôre building a movement.
